mapper.select: select id, from instance_slow_log where app_id = #{appId}
select id, from instance_slow_log where app_id = #{appId} and create_time between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by execute_time desc

select concat(ip,":",port) as hostPort,count(*) as count from instance_slow_log where app_id = #{appId} and create_time between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') group by hostPort order by count desc
select count(*) as count from instance_slow_log where app_id = #{appId} and create_time between DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
